title.title: The Real Price of Free: what self-hosting ReportPortal actually costs

contentfulBlogPost.seoDescription: Going On-Prem with our test results dashboard? Understand the full cost in time, tools, and resources before choosing.
contentfulBlogPost.author: ReportPortal Team
